channel.title: Error - 317 Webclient
channel.description:
I've uploaded my Cache to my host, with my Sprites inside, my Cache connects correctly and downloads the cache straight from the web, with the sprites aswell.
I jarred and signed the client correctly, I've changed all my directory files to the correct directory it needed to go to in local disk.
So I ran the Jar file via desktop, it worked ;P
Then I took the HTML file and uploaded it to my website, I went on it and everything worked so far so good, and I got something like:
"Updating client"
then..
"Error Connecting - Retrying in 5" and on..AND ON.
I rechecked everything, and I've gotten no errors on the application.
Any suggestions?

item.title: Error - 317 Webclient
item.dc:creator: @vengscape vengscape
item.description:
@vengscape wrote:

Simplest solution to this is to use this html for ur client:

WEBCLIENT NAME

Hope this helps

item.title: Error - 317 Webclient
item.dc:creator: @Punkzombie Punkzombie
item.description:
@Punkzombie wrote:

Another problem could be is when you where editing your client.java you went into it and never changed the background to link to your destination.

Read full topic

item.title: Error - 317 Webclient
item.dc:creator: @Continue Continue
item.description:
@Continue wrote:

Most likely because you need to start your server first, then your web client. Try that and tell me what happens.

Read full topic
